name: Coldheart

skills.name: Icy Edge
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 25%.

effects.notes: 30% base (40% booked) chance to decrease target TM by 25%. TM control for dungeon bosses.

skills.notes: Single-hit A1. TM decrease useful for dungeon boss control. Not high priority for books vs A2/A3.

skills.name: Shatter Freeze
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 4 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 10%.

effects.notes: 20% base (30% booked) chance per hit to decrease TM by 10%. 4 hits = ~67% total chance for at least one proc (booked).

skills.book_value: HIGH: +20% damage, +10% TM decrease chance per hit (20%→30%), -1 cooldown (4→3). Essential for dungeon TM control.
skills.notes: 4-hit multi-hit synergizes with Giant Slayer (4 hits = ~76% proc). Primary TM control skill. Must book for 3-turn cooldown.

skills.name: Heartseeker
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases according to the target's Turn Meter. The hit is always critical and damage inflicted is equal to 30% of the target's MAX HP. Decreases the target's Turn Meter to 0. This ability deals additional damage equal to 3% of the target's MAX HP for each debuff on the target.

effects.notes: BASE: 30% of target's MAX HP. Always crits. Ignores DEF. Damage increases with target TM (scales up to double at 100% TM).
BONUS: +3% target MAX HP per debuff on target (max 10 debuffs = +30% MAX HP = 60% total).
Decreases target TM to 0. Ultimate TM control for dungeon bosses.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -1 cooldown (5→4). Essential for more frequent MAX HP nukes. Priority book.
skills.notes: ICONIC skill. 30-60% target MAX HP damage (based on debuffs + TM). Always crits. Resets boss TM to 0. PRIMARY damage source for dungeons. Must book to 4-turn cooldown for speed runs.

forms.comments: ICONIC Epic dungeon champion. Best-in-class for dungeons (10/10). MAX HP nuke on A3 decimates bosses. TM control on all skills. Must book A2/A3. Build 100% C.RATE for A2 damage, high C.DMG for A3, 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, 250%+ C.DMG. A3 MAX HP nuke excellent for CB. Not top-tier but viable.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 220+ SPD (speed tuning for boss TM control), 200+ ACC (reliable TM decrease), 100% C.RATE (A2 damage), 250%+ C.DMG (A3 nuke scales with C.DMG). Savage or Cruel sets for maximum boss damage.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: Low priority. If used: 250+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, 300%+ C.DMG for nuke.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, 250%+ C.DMG. A3 MAX HP nuke excellent for boss floors.

faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, WARMASTER (A3 MAX HP nuke primary damage)

masteries.general: WARMASTER vs Giant Slayer debate: Most endgame players use WARMASTER for Coldheart because A3 'Heartseeker' MAX HP nuke (30-60% target MAX HP) is her primary damage source, and Warmaster's 60% proc chance on that massive hit outweighs Giant Slayer procs on A2 4-hit. However, Giant Slayer is viable if focusing on A2 damage for wave clear. RECOMMENDATION: Warmaster for boss nuking (standard build). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for 200+ total, reliable TM decrease on A1/A2). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 turns booked, A3 5→4 turns booked for more frequent TM control/nukes). Must book A2 (-1 cooldown, +10% TM chance per hit) and A3 (-1 cooldown). Low DEF glass cannon - needs protection in some content.

blessings: Phantom Touch (speed boost for TM control)
Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will prioritize A3 when available for MAX HP nuke. Uses A2 for TM control. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. Pure TM control + MAX HP nuke specialist for dungeons/bosses.

mechanics_advisory: BEST-IN-CLASS Epic for dungeons (10/10). ICONIC for a reason: A3 'Heartseeker' is one of the best boss-killing skills in the game. BASE 30% target MAX HP damage (ignores DEF, always crits) + scales with target TM (up to 60% at 100% TM) + bonus 3% per debuff (max 10 = +30% = 60% total) + resets boss TM to 0. In full debuff teams, A3 can hit for 60% of boss MAX HP in ONE hit. A1/A2 provide additional TM control (A2 4-hit can proc TM decrease up to 4 times). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for cooldown reduction (A2 4→3, A3 5→4). Build 100% C.RATE, 250%+ C.DMG, 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC. Savage sets maximize A3 damage. Warmaster preferred for A3 MAX HP nuke scaling (Warmaster 60% proc on 30-60% MAX HP hit = insane damage). User Priority: Dungeons (Priority 2 - 10/10), Doom Tower (Priority 3 - 9/10). Dark Elves Faction Wars excellent (8/10). MUST-BUILD champion for all accounts. Glass cannon - low DEF/HP, needs protection.
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: ICONIC Epic. Best dungeon champion in game for boss killing. A3 MAX HP nuke decimates bosses. Must book A2/A3. Warmaster > Giant Slayer for A3 scaling. Build high C.DMG + SPD + ACC. Glass cannon - protect in waves.
